data.text: “Ke azɔ la, ame siwo menye xoxo na,
Nu ka woƒe alɔkpa sesẽ la wɔ nam,
Hiã kple dɔwuame na wowɔ ɖeƒomevie hele tsatsam
Le gbe me woda amagbewo
Woɖe wo ɖa le wo nɔvi amegbetɔwo ƒe ha me
Wozi wo dzi be woanɔ tɔʋu siwo mie la me,
Wole xɔxlɔ̃m le gbe me
Wonya wo le anyigba la dzi abe ame ɖigbɔ̃wo
“Ke azɔ la, wo viŋutsuwo kpa ha dem,
Wonyɔa ŋum, henɔa adzɔge nam
Esi azɔ Mawu lã nye datika, hewɔ fum la,
Wo detɔwo tso ɖe ŋutinye le nye ɖusime,
Wogbã nye mɔ, edze edzi na wo be
Wolũ ɖe dzinye abe gli gbagbã mee woto ene
Ŋɔdzidodowo nye tsyɔ dzinye,
“Azɔ nye agbe nu va le yiyim
Zã ŋɔa nye ƒuwo
Mawu tsyɔ eƒe ŋusẽ triakɔ la
Ekɔm ƒu gbe ɖe ba me
“O Mawu, mefa avi yɔ wò gake mètɔ nam o,
Ètrɔ dze dzinye nublanuimakpɔmakpɔtɔe
Èƒom tsa, hena ya lɔm ɖe nu
Menya be àhem ayi ku me,
“Vavãe, ame aɖeke medoa asi ɖa léa
Ɖe nyemefa avi ɖe ame siwo ɖo xaxa me la ŋu oa?
Gake esi mekpɔ mɔ na nyui la, vɔ̃ tum,
Dzoxɔxɔ si le edzi yim le menye la metɔna o,
Nye amea menyɔ tsiɖitsiɖitsiɖi le yiyim
Meva zu nɔviŋutsu na amegãxiwo
Nye ŋutigbalẽ nyɔ tsiɖitsiɖitsiɖi hele fofom le ŋutinye
Nye kasaŋku do konyifagbe
